body.name: WEEKENDER Down Alternative Hotel Quality 100% Cotton Cover-Soft Hypoallergenic Standard (1 Single Pillow), Dorm Room Essentials
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 14 hrs 12 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Hypoallergenic: soft down alternative fill offers the look and feel of traditional down pillows without the associated odors or allergens
Comfortable and conformable: all the loft and customizable comfort of a traditional down pillow, this hypoallergenic alternative is perfect for back, stomach, and side sleepers alike
Quality material: hotel quality 100% cotton cover for a crisp, classic look that sleeps soft and comfortable
Sophisticated design: edges are piped and double stitched for a timeless lasting style
Conveniently shipped: includes 1 pillow measuring 16" x 25" x 6"; compressed and rolled for convenient shipping; fluff pillow vigorously and allow 24 to 48 hours to fully decompress
body.description: Looking for an upgrade to your basic bed pillow? Drift off to sleep on the comfort of cotton and soft down alternative fill. This classic white pillow features hypoallergenic down alternative filling that offers traditional style and soft, cozy comfort. Breathable fill can be fluffed and patted to create a customized sleep surface with the perfect form and support. The cover is made of 100% cotton and has piped, double-stitched edges for lasting comfort. This pillow holds its shape and will not go flat over time. You get all the benefits of down without the downsides: no odors, allergens or sharp quills. Pillow is compressed and rolled for easy shipping. Cover: 100 percent cotton, Filling: 100 percent polyester.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the hotel quality feel and comfort of these sheets and will be buying more in the future.Everyone needs to understand the first wash should be when you open the package and before using.The fabric comes to life after that first wash. I saw a sateen look on opening and I do not like sateen but that wash totally brought out the texture I want.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2018
reviews.reviewText: Previously, I gave it a 3 star cos the pillow doesnt seem to fluff up much and seemed alittle bit too flat. Plus it sinks abit too much when i rest my head on it. So I felt like it did not suit me.Then I tried 'slapping' the pillows at the longitudinal ends towards the middle/ pushing the fluffy content of the pillow towards its core for a couple of times. Upon doing so, the pillow seems to be fluffier and doesnt seem to sink as much. Problem seemed to be solved but let's see how it performs in the next few days! So future customers, if your pillow feels abit too flat, try 'massaging' the pillow to properly distribute the fluff after unrolling it.Nonetheless, goods aside, I felt that linenspa has a great customer support team. They are always reaching out to customers who feel unsatisfied and wanting to make it up to them. Really appreciate such gestures.1st week: it was bad. it sinks alot2nd to 4th week for now: after fluffing it towards the middle, it doesnt sink as much. my sleep was great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars not enough support
reviews.reviewText: Honestly, the pillow is pretty good quality, beautiful- holds it's medium-high fluffy shape, and my silk pillowcase looks great on it. It's very soft and squishy despite looking so filled, and I was looking forward to sleep on it- until I tried getting comfortable that is. My head sunk in it almost completely, it felt like it almost became level with my mattress!! I tried fluffing it and molding the shape- I even tried sleeping flat on my back (I'm usually a side sleeper, but can do flat back sleeping from time to time) just to somehow make it work and give me at least some support for my head/neck, but to no avail. I wound up propping it up with another pillow behind it to create a slope and somehow passed out eventually. It's a shame- I really wanted it to work. I'm gona keep it as an extra pillow to decorate the bed with or when I hang out/sit on my bed and need some extra comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A pillow to dream on!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered one of these pillows after looking at a hundred others. Did not want something real expensive yet I didn't want one so cheap it would get lumpy after one night's sleep. This pillow was in my price range and it was polyester fill. So I took a chance and only bought one just to see how it would do. Let me tell ya I was impressed with the stitching and how it bounced right back up upon applying pressure. The real test came after I had slept on it. Yep it's a keeper. Turned right around and bought the 2nd one for my bed. Wonderful pillows. I highly recommend them. I am real picky about pillows. I know they will last a long time. Couldn't be happier. They conform to my sleeping needs. I crunch my pillow under my head. Worried the fill would shift. Nope it stayed in place and bounced right back. Enough said. Would buy again. Fast shipping to boot!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2018
reviews.reviewText: I bought this pillow for my daughter who just transitioned into a twin size bed. The pillow arrived on time, vacuum sealed, and in perfect condition. I washed it immediately after it arrived and accidentally put it in the dryer on high heat. When I got the pillow out of the dryer, it was still fluffy, soft, and un damaged. My daughter has slept on it for a week now and seems very comfortable when laying on it. I was so impressed, I just ordered two more for my son’s bed and I am contemplating ordering two king size pillows. This is a good pillow for the price. I honestly expected less.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Just not for me
reviews.reviewText: These are decent pillows to have on a bed but not for sleeping on. The pillows go flat very quickly. They offer little to no support and make for a sore neck in the morning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort and easy sleep at night
reviews.reviewText: I've been looking for a pillow after unsuccessfully buying "the most-comfortable" and "help you sleep soundly" kinds. After a few months, these pillows resembled lumpy oatmeal. When searching through Amazon, I saw this pillow and figured I would give it a try. The reviews (as many on Amazon do) range from "it's great" to "it's terrible." After two weeks of use, the WEEKENDER pillow still is comfortable and supports my head. When it arrived it is vacuum-sealed, so it appears crushed. After opening it, the pillow expanded. I decided to shake it a bit just to open it further. I used the pillow the same day. If you are reading this review and seeing it's after two weeks from my purchase, I'd understand your skepticism. I'll update in a month to provide a further review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this pillow--no more waking up with sore neck
reviews.reviewText: Its hard to find a good pillow anymore. I should know, I have about 10 of them and none of them are comfortable.. They are mostly foam or gel and I just can't get comfortable with them. Most of them cost around $80.00 and I still wake up with a very sore neck. When I saw the weekender Down alternative pillow and so many positive reviews I thought " what the heck" I'll try it, figuring that with the low price, I would probably end up sending it to the recycle bin. WHAT A GREAT SURPRISE. I really do love this pillow. Not to hard or to soft. IT'S PERFECT. It is just like the feather pillows my granny had, without the feathers poking me. You can also squash this pillow, which I love. I highly recommend this pillow and I will be purchasing more in the near future.
